name: Fallen Star TapTap Blast Game
description:
Wildly addictive! Super exciting tap jump game for all ages! Fallen Star has lost its glow and is stranded on Earth. Can you help Fallen Star return home so it can shine bright once again? Try out your tap game skills and challenge yourself to the fullest!

ADDICTIVE TAPPER ARCADE GAME
Fallen Star is a thrilling tap jump arcade game that can be enjoyed by players of any age – it is one of the best tap games of 2018! Easy to pick up and play, shining with great 2d arcade game graphics and engaging sound effects, Fallen Star is here to take you on an unforgettable journey full of challenges, obstacles and cool game features! Will you be able to take home the little twinkle star?

HOW TO PLAY?
With intuitive touch screen controls and simple rules, this tap tap tap arcade game is easy to play, yet hard to master. Your main goal is to tap and jump in order to take the star higher. Tap on your screen to jump on the platforms and don’t fall down! Fallen Star will addict you to the fullest with its fun and endless tap jump gameplay.

WIN THE HIGHEST SCORES
Tap and jump to get higher, play as long as possible, jump as high as you can to win unbeatable points! Compare the tap arcade scores with your friends and don’t forget to use hearts to save your life from the last checkpoint you died and lost the tap game. Get 1 free heart for every 10th level you reach! Enjoy the best 2d arcade game on your mobile, anywhere and anytime!

FALLEN STAR FEATURES
- Highly addictive tap arcade game
- Beautiful and engaging 2D graphics
- Tap and jump on the platforms
- Get the little star as higher as possible
- Jump as high as you can to win points
- Compare scores with your friends
- Use hearts to save your life from the last checkpoint you lost
- Get 1 free heart for every 10th level you reach
- FREE to play tap jump game
- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -
You'll love to play Fallen Star for hours and hours!
Download this insanely addictive and fun tap game for FREE!
